poem.title: To Ozymandias at the OK Corral
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Hail, Thane of the Azores, Hail, King of Poland, About to be the Caliph of Baghdad!
Mother of all bombs Pray for us Pillar of salt Pray for us Political science Do what you want Hail to the Chief Bomb us Shock and awe Vote for us
I and fifteen nations that prefer to remain anonymous Support you in whatever it is you do.
